verses.roman:
śrīvāsa-putrera tāhāṅ haila paraloka
tabu śrīvāsera citte nā janmila śoka

synonyms: śrīvāsa—of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; putrera—of the son; tāhāṅ—there; haila—took place; paraloka—death; tabu—still; śrīvāsera—of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; citte—in the mind; nā—not; janmila—there was; śoka—lamentation.
translation: At that time a calamity took place-Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura's son died. Yet Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura was not at all sorry.
